title: N.S. reports second COVID-19 death at Cape Breton Regional Hospital - CTV News
description: N.S. reports second COVID-19 death at Cape Breton Regional Hospital CTV News Second death related to COVID-19 confirmed in Nova Scotia CBC.ca Premier’s ‘Stay The Blazes Home’ Warning Is Now A Kitchen Party Song HuffPost Canada 2nd death connected to coronavir…
content: HALIFAX There has been another death connected to COVID at the Cape Breton Regional Hospital The Nova Scotia government announced the death Thursday This is the second COVID death in the province The woman was in her s and had underlying med chars
